title: Upbound uses third-party assessments for new suppliers
statement: Upbound engages third-party suppliers to conduct on-site assessments of facilities, labor practices, and working conditions for new product sources.

citations.quote: Where new sources of product have been considered, Upbound has engaged third-party suppliers to conduct on-site assessments of facilities, labor practices, working conditions, and product compliance to qualify as a supplier for Upbound.
